title: Dotlyx
description: A modern dotfiles management system built with Bash and Nix. Streamlines development environment setup across multiple machines with declarative configuration and automated provisioning.

title: Codely Theme Zed
description: A beautiful, customizable theme for the Zed code editor. Features syntax highlighting, UI components, and extensive customization options for an enhanced coding experience.

title: VibeVault
description: A modern music streaming and management application. Built with cutting-edge web technologies, featuring playlist management, audio visualization, and seamless user experience.

title: Intelligent Personal Knowledge Manager
description: An AI-powered knowledge management system that helps organize, connect, and retrieve information efficiently. Features intelligent search, note-taking, and knowledge graph visualization.
